anya-e0804n2:4_2: Ettha āvaraṇaṁ nāma pidahanaṁ vā parirundhanaṁ vā palibuddhanaṁ vā harituṁ vā appadānaṁ, sabbametaṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0804n2:4_3: Rundhati, rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, avarundheti. Kammani –
anya-e0804n2:4_5: Rodho, orodho, virodho, paṭivirodho, viruddho, paṭiviruddho, pariruddho.
anya-e0804n2:5_1: So hi rundhati pavesitānaṁ kurūrakammantānaṁ sattānaṁ gamanaṁ āvaratīti rodhoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:5_2: Orodhoti rājubbarī, sā pana yathākāmacāraṁ carituṁ appadānena orundhiyati avarundhiyatīti orodho.
anya-e0804n2:5_8: Vuttañhi “yathā arīhi pariruddho, vijjante gamane pathe”ti.
anya-e0804n2:6_0: Muca mocane. Migaṁ bandhanā muñcati. Muñcanaṁ, mocanaṁ. Dukkhappamocanaṁ, moco.
anya-e0804n2:7_0: Mocoti cettha aṭṭhikakadalīrukkho. Muñcituṁ. Muñcitvā. Kārite “moceti, mocetuṁ, mocetvā”tiādīni.
anya-e0804n2:8_0: Rica virecane. Riñcati. Riñcanaṁ, virecanaṁ, vireko, virecako. Riñcituṁ. Riñcitvā.
anya-e0804n2:9_4: Siñca bhikkhu imaṁ nāvaṁ, sittā te lahumessati.
anya-e0804n2:10_4: Yuñjanaṁ, saṁyogo, anuyogo, bhāvanānuyutto, saññogo, saññojanaṁ, atthayojanā.
anya-e0804n2:14_6: Bhojanaṁ, sambhogo, mahibhujo, gāmabhojako, upabhogo, paribhogo.
anya-e0804n2:14_10: Tumantāditte “bhuñjituṁ, paribhuñjituṁ, bhojetuṁ, bhojayituṁ, bhuñjitvā, bhuñjitvāna, bhuñjiya, bhuñjiyāna, bhojetvā, bhojetvāna, bhojayitvā, bhojayitvāna” iccādīni parisaddādīhi visesitabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:15_0: Tatra bhuñjatīti bhattaṁ bhuñjati, bhojanīyaṁ bhuñjati.
anya-e0804n2:15_1: Tathā hi “khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:15_3: “Phalāni khuddakappāni, bhuñja rāja varāvara”nti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:15_4: Paribhuñjatīti cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati, piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjati, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñjati, paṭisevatīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0804n2:15_5: Teneva ca paṭisevatīti paribhuñjatīti attho saṁvaṇṇiyati.
anya-e0804n2:15_6: Apica “kāme bhuñjatī”ti ca “pañcakāmaguṇe paribhuñjatī”ti ca dassanato pana bhuñjanaparibhuñjanasaddā paṭisevanatthena katthaci samānatthāpi hontīti avagantabbā.
anya-e0804n2:15_7: Saṁbhuñjatīti sambhogaṁ karoti, ekato vāsaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:15_8: Ettha siyā “nanu ca bho atra bhujadhātu pālanabyavaharaṇesu vutto, so kathaṁ ettakesupi atthesu vattatī”ti?
anya-e0804n2:15_9: Vattateva, anekatthā hi dhātavo, te upasaggasahāye labhitvāpi anekatthatarāva honti.
anya-e0804n2:15_10: Ito paṭṭhāya tumantādīni rūpāni na vakkhāma.
anya-e0804n2:15_11: Yattha pana viseso dissati, tattha vakkhāma.
anya-e0804n2:17_1: Anāgatatthe vattabbe “bhejjissati, bhindissatī”ti dvidhā bhavanti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:17_2: Pāpake akusale dhamme bhindatīti bhikkhu. Tenāha –
anya-e0804n2:18_0: “Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;
anya-e0804n2:19_0: Visaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
anya-e0804n2:22_0: Idañca khīṇāsavaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, sekkhaputhujjanasamaṇāpi yathāsambhavaṁ “bhikkhū”ti vattabbataṁ pāpuṇantiyeva.
anya-e0804n2:23_5: Idaṁ pana bhidichididvayaṁ divādigaṇaṁ patvā “bhijjati chijjatī”ti suddhakattuvācakaṁ rūpadvayaṁ janeti, tasmā “bhijjatīti bhinno”tiādinā suddhakattuvasenapi nibbacanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:24_0: Tadi hiṁsānādaresu. Tandati. Tandī, taddu. Taddati kacchu.
anya-e0804n2:25_0: Udi pasavakiledanesu. Pasavanaṁ sandanaṁ. Kiledanaṁ tindatā. Undati. Undūro, samuddo.
anya-e0804n2:26_0: Vida lābhe. Vindati. Govindo, vitti. Ettha vittīti anubhavanaṁ, vedanā vā.
anya-e0804n2:28_1: “Vitti hi maṁ vindati suta disvā”ti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:29_0: Vedaganthe ca ñāṇe ca, somanasse ca vattati;
anya-e0804n2:31_0: Lipa limpane. Limpati, limpako. Avalepo. Avalepoti ahaṅkāro.
anya-e0804n2:32_0: Lupa acchedane. Lumpati. Vilumpako, vilutto vilopo.
anya-e0804n2:34_0: Yadā caññe vilumpanti, so vilutto vilumpatīti.
anya-e0804n2:35_2: Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “attano piyabhāvaṁ parassa ca suññabhāvaṁ yāya vācāya bhāsati, sā pisuṇā vācā”ti vuttaṁ, taṁ niruttilakkhaṇena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:37_0: Ahiṁsakoti me nāmaṁ, hiṁsakassa pure sato;
anya-e0804n2:38_0: Ajjāhaṁ saccanāmomhi, na naṁ hiṁsāmi kiñcanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:40_0: Sumbhapahāre. Yo no gāvova sumbhati. Parisumbhati. Sumbhoti. Atrime pāḷito payogā –
anya-e0804n2:43_0: Datvā ca no pakkamati, bahudukkhaṁ anappaka”nti ca,
anya-e0804n2:45_2: Kecettha maññeyyuṁ, yathā bhūvādigaṇe “saki saṅkāyaṁ khaji gativekalle”tiādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ paṭiladdhavaggantabhāvassa niggahītāgamassa vasena “saṅkati khañjatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti, tathā imasmiṁ rudhādigaṇe “muca mocane kati chedane”tiādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ paṭiladdhavaggantabhāvassa niggahītāgamassa vasena “muñcati kantatī”tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:45_3: Evaṁ sante ko imesaṁ tesañca visesoti?
anya-e0804n2:45_5: ye bhūvādigaṇasmiṁ anekassarā asaṁyogantā ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhā, te ākhyātattañca nāmikattañca patvā suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti, na katthacipi tesaṁ vinā niggahītāgamena rūpappavatti dissati.
anya-e0804n2:45_8: Ayaṁ anekassarānaṁ ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhānaṁ bhūvādigaṇikānaṁ viseso.
anya-e0804n2:46_0: Ye ca rudhādigaṇasmiṁ anekassarā asaṁyogantvā akārantavasena vā ukārantavasena vā niddiṭṭhā, te ākhyātattaṁ patvā suddhakattuvisayeyeva ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti, na hetukattuvisaye.
anya-e0804n2:46_1: Nāmikattaṁ pana sahaniggahītāgamena vinā ca niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:46_2: Yattha vinā niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā, tattha sasaṁyogarūpāyeva bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:46_10: Piṭṭhimaṁsāni attano, sāmaṁ ukkacca khādasi iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:47_0: Nanu ca bho evaṁ sante ākhyātanāmikabhāvaṁ patvā suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato paṭiladdhaniggahītāgamehi saki khaji ādīhiyeva rudhādigaṇikehi bhavitabbaṁ, na pana mucachidiādīhīti?
anya-e0804n2:47_1: Tanna, mucachidiādīhiyeva rudhādigaṇikehi bhavitabbaṁ rucadhātuyā samānagatikattā, tathā hi yathā “rundhissa, rundhayati, rundhāpeti, rundhanaṁ, rodho, virodho”tiādīsu niggahītāgamāniggahītāgamavasena dvippakārāni rūpāni dissanti, tathā mucachidiādīnampīti.
anya-e0804n2:48_0: Nanu kaccāyane niggahītāgamassa niccavidhānatthaṁ “rudhādito niggahītapubbañcā”ti lakkhaṇaṁ vuttanti?
anya-e0804n2:48_1: Saccaṁ, taṁ pana kriyāpadattaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:48_2: Yadi ca nāmikapadattampi sandhāya vuttaṁ bhaveyya, “virodho”tiādīnaṁ dassanato vāsaddaṁ pakkhipitvā vattabbaṁ siyā, na ca vāsaddaṁ pakkhipitvā vuttaṁ, tena ñāyati kriyāpadattaṁyeva sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0804n2:49_0: Nanu ca bho evaṁ sante sakikhajiādīnaṁ niccaṁ saniggahītāgamakriyāpadattaṁyeva sandhāya “rudhādito niggahītapubbañcā”ti idaṁ vuttanti sakkā mantunti?
anya-e0804n2:49_1: Na sakkā, sakikhajiādīnaṁ rudhadhātuyā asamānagatikattā nāmikatte dvippakārassa asambhavato.
anya-e0804n2:49_2: Tathā hi yesaṁ yā nāmikatte niggahītāgamāniggahītāgamavasena dvippakāravantatā, sā eva tesaṁ rudhādigaṇabhāvassa lakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:49_4: “Saṅkā khañjo”tiādinā hi nāmatte ekoyeva pakāro dissati saniggahītāgamo, “kamu padavikkhepe”iccādīnaṁ pana “kamo, kamanaṁ, caṅkamo, caṅkamana”ntiādinā nāmikatte dvippakāravantatāsambhavepi niggahītāgamassa abbhāsavisaye pavattattā sā dvippakāravantatā rudhādigaṇabhāvassa lakkhaṇaṁ na hoti, tasmā abbhāsavisaye pavattaṁ niggahītāgamaṁ vajjetvā yā dvippakāravantatā, sāyeva rudhādigaṇikabhāvassa lakkhaṇanti sanniṭṭhānaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:49_5: Ayaṁ nayo atīva sukhumo sammā manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0804n2:50_0: Rudhādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:54_1: Ettha ca kīḷāti laḷanā, vihāro vā.
anya-e0804n2:54_11: Imesu atthesu divudhātu vattati. Dibbati. Devo. Devī. Devatā.
anya-e0804n2:55_0: Ettha devoti tividhā devā sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti.
anya-e0804n2:55_1: Tesu mahāsammatakālato paṭṭhāya lokena “devā”ti sammatattā rājarājakumārādayo sammutidevā nāma.
anya-e0804n2:55_4: Vuttampi cetaṁ “sammutidevā nāma rājāno deviyo kumārā.
anya-e0804n2:56_1: dibbanti kāmaguṇajhānābhiññācittissariyādīhi kīḷanti, tesu vā viharantīti devā.
anya-e0804n2:56_2: Dibbanti yathābhilāsitaṁ visayaṁ appaṭighātena gacchantīti devā.
anya-e0804n2:56_4: Atha vā taṁtaṁbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṁ parāyaṇanti devanīyā abhitthavanīyāti devā.
anya-e0804n2:57_0: Ettha ca thutikanti atthā kammasādhanavasena daṭṭhabbā, kīḷādayo cha atthā kattusādhanavasena.
anya-e0804n2:57_3: Keci “thutī”ti padaṁ vihāya “jutigatīsū”ti paṭhanti, keci pana divudhātuṁ “sattithutika”ntiatthepi icchanti.
anya-e0804n2:57_4: Tenāha abhidhammassa anuṭīkākāro “devasaddo yathā kīḷāvijigisāvohārajutigatiattho, evaṁ sattiabhitthavakamanatthopi hoti dhātusaddānaṁ anekatthabhāvato”tiādi.
anya-e0804n2:58_0: Idaṁ pana yathāvuttesu sammutidevādīsu paccekaṁ nibbacanaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:58_1: dibbanti kīḷanti attano visaye issariyaṁ karontīti devā, rājāno.
anya-e0804n2:58_2: Dibbanti kīḷanti pañcahi kāmaguṇehi, paṭipakkhe vā vijetuṁ icchanti, voharanti ca lokassa yuttāyuttaṁ, jotanti paramāya sarīrajutiyā, thomiyanti tabbhāvatthikehi, kāmiyanti daṭṭhuṁ sotuñca sobhāvisesayogena, gacchanti ca yathicchitaṭṭhānaṁ appaṭihatagamanena, sakkonti ca ānubhāvasampattiyā taṁtaṁkiccaṁ nipphādetunti devā, cātumahārājikādayo.
anya-e0804n2:58_3: Kīḷanti paramāya jhānakīḷāya, vijetuṁ icchanti paṭipakkhaṁ, paramasukhumañāṇavisesavisayaṁ atthañca voharanti, jotanti sabbakilesadosakalusābhāvā paramavisuddhāya ñāṇajutiyā, thomiyanti ca viññātasabhāvehi paramanimmalaguṇavisesayogato, kāmiyanti ca anuttarapuññakkhettatāya daṭṭhuṁ sotuṁ pūjituñca, gacchanti ca amatamahānibbānaṁ apaccāgamanīyāya gatiyā, sakkonti ca cittācāraṁ ñatvā te te satte hite niyojetuṁ amatamahānibbānasukhe ca patiṭṭhāpetunti devā, visuddhidevā.
anya-e0804n2:59_3: “Ahaṁ deva sakalajambudīpe aññassa rañño santike kiñci bhayaṁ na passāmī”tiādīsu issarapuggale.
anya-e0804n2:59_4: “Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti devo maññe”tiādīsu upapattideve.
anya-e0804n2:60_1: Devassa bhariyāti hi devī, sāpi atthato “dibbatīti devī”ti vattabbā, yathā “bhikkhatīti bhikkhunī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:60_2: Tathā hi vuttaṁ vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “dibbati attano puññiddhiyā kīḷatīti devī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:61_1: “Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya ruttiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā”tiādīsu hi devaputto “devatā”ti vutto “devoyeva devatā”ti katvā, tathā “tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā, brahmā vimānā abhinikkhamitvā”tiādīsu brahmāno.
anya-e0804n2:63_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā”ti-
anya-e0804n2:66_0: Devo suro ca vibudho, nijjaro amaro maru;
anya-e0804n2:69_0: Khi khaye. Khiyati. Khayo. Khiyanaṁ. Rāgakkhayo.
anya-e0804n2:70_0: Khi nivāse kodhahiṁsāsu ca. Khiyati. Na gacchasi yamakkhayaṁ. Nāgadānena khiyanti.
anya-e0804n2:71_0: Tattha khiyatīti nivasati. Yamakkhayanti yamanivesanaṁ. Khiyantīti kujjhanti hiṁsanti vā.
anya-e0804n2:72_0: Ghā gandhopādāne. Ghāyatīti ghānaṁ. Ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyituṁ ghāyitvā.
anya-e0804n2:73_6: Keci pana imasmiṁ divādigaṇe “ruca dittimhī”ti paṭhanti.
anya-e0804n2:73_7: Taṁ na yuttaṁ katthacipi dittisaṅkhātasobhanatthavācakassa rucadhātuno “ruccatī”ti rūpābhāvato.
anya-e0804n2:73_8: Tasmā evaṁ sallakkhetabbaṁ, dittirucīnaṁ vācako rucadhātu bhuvādigaṇiko.
anya-e0804n2:73_11: Ruciyāyeva vācako pana divādigaṇikopi hoti curādigaṇikopi.
anya-e0804n2:73_12: Tassa hi divādigaṇikakāle “gamanaṁ mayhaṁ ruccatī”ti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:73_13: Curādigaṇikakāle “kiṁ nu jātiṁ na rocesī”ti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:73_14: Āpubbo ce ācikkhane vattati, “āroceti, ārocayatī”ti rūpāni dissanti.
anya-e0804n2:74_0: Muca mokkhe. Dukkhato muccati. Saddhāya adhimuccati. Mutti, vimutti, adhimutti, muccamāno.
anya-e0804n2:75_0: Uca samavāye. Uccati. Oko, ūkā, ukkā.
anya-e0804n2:76_1: “Okapuṇṇehi cīvarehī”ti ca, “vārijova thale khitto, okamokatamubbhato”ti cettha payogo.
anya-e0804n2:77_2: “Ukkaṁ bandheyya, ukkaṁ bandhitvā, ukkāmukhaṁ ālimpeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne aṅgārakapallaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:77_3: “Kammārānaṁ yathā ukkā, anto jhāyati no bahī”ti āgataṭṭhāne kammāruddhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:77_4: “Evaṁ vipāko ukkāpāto bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhāne vātavego “ukkā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:77_5: “Saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṁ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne suvaṇṇakārānaṁ mūsā “ukkā”ti veditabbā. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:81_0: Che chedane. Chiyati, chiyanti. Avacchitaṁ, avacchātaṁ. Chetvāna moḷiṁ varagandhavāsitaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:82_0: Saja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṁ. Sajjati. Sajjanaṁ, sajjito, satto.
anya-e0804n2:83_1: Samādhānaṁ samādhi, kāyakammādīnaṁ sammāpayogavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Yujjati.
anya-e0804n2:86_0: Passāmi vo’ha’mattānaṁ, yathā icchiṁ tathā ahu”nti
anya-e0804n2:87_0: Vacanato avassaṁ kātuṁ yujjati upapajjatīti yogoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:88_2: Rajjamāno, rajjaṁ, rajjanto, rāgo, virāgo, rajjanaṁ, virajjanaṁ, rajanīyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:88_4: Samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati, attano raṭṭhā niggacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:89_0: Tattha virāgoti virajjanti ettha saṁkilesadhammāti virāgo, nibbānaṁ maggo ca.
anya-e0804n2:90_0: Vijī bhayacalanesu. Vijjati, saṁvijjati. Saṁvego, saṁvejanīyaṁ. Ubbijjati. Ubbego, ubbiggahadayo.
anya-e0804n2:91_0: Lujavināse. Lujjatīti loko. Lopo, lutti, lujjanaṁ, lutto.
anya-e0804n2:92_1: Ṭhāyī, ṭhiti, ṭhānaṁ, ṭhito, tatraṭṭho, tiṭṭhaṁ, kappaṭṭhāyī, āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyī.
anya-e0804n2:95_0: Pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Lāpaṁ gocaraṭṭhāyinanti ca. Tattha ṭhāyāmīti tiṭṭhāmi.
anya-e0804n2:98_2: So nūna kapaṇo tāto, ciraṁ rujjati assame.
anya-e0804n2:99_0: Tatra parittanti mahātejavantatāya samantato sattānaṁ bhayaṁ upaddavaṁ upasaggañca tāyati rakkhatīti parittaṁ, gaṁ tāyatīti gottaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:100_0: Nata gattavināme. Gattavināmo gattavikkhepo. Naccati. Naccaṁ. Nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto.
anya-e0804n2:101_0: Dā sodhane. Dāyati. Dānaṁ. Anuyogadāpanatthaṁ. Anuyogaṁ datvā. Dānaṁ datvā.
anya-e0804n2:102_0: Dāsupane. Dāyati. Niddāyati. Niddāyanaṁ, niddāyamāno, niddāyanto.
anya-e0804n2:103_5: purisena dānaṁ dīyati, adinnaṁ ādiyati. Kārite –
anya-e0804n2:103_6: ādapeti, samādapeti, ādapayati, samādapayati, ye dhammamevādapayanti santo.
anya-e0804n2:105_0: Ettha ca parittanti samantato khaṇḍitattā parittaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:105_2: Tasmā parittanti appakassa nāmaṁ kāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa appesakkhattā.
anya-e0804n2:106_2: Tathā hi “vodāyati sujjhati etenāti vodānaṁ, samathavipassanā”ti nettisaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:108_1: Ādīnavotiādīnaṁ dukkhaṁ vāti adhigacchati etenātiādīnavo, doso.
anya-e0804n2:110_0: Bhidi bhijjane. Bhijjanadhammaṁ bhijjati. Bhijjatīti bhinno. Bhijjanaṁ bhedo.
anya-e0804n2:111_0: Chidi chijjane. Suttaṁ chijjati. Chijjatīti chinno. Evaṁ chiddaṁ. Chijjanaṁ chedo.
anya-e0804n2:112_2: Khijjati, khinno, akhinnamati, khedo, khedaṅgato lokahitāya nātho.
anya-e0804n2:113_0: Ettha khedaṅgatoti kāyikadukkhasaṅkhātaṁ parissamaṁ patto, dukkhamanubhavīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:114_5: Akammakampi bhavati, tesaṁ adhammo āpajjati, pajjo, byagghapajjo, sampadāyo.
anya-e0804n2:115_1: Byagghapajje saddulapathe jātoti byagghapajjo, evaṁnāmako kulaputto.
anya-e0804n2:115_2: Sampadiyati ñāpiyati dhammo etenāti sampadāyo, akkhātā.
anya-e0804n2:116_0: Vida sattāyaṁ. Sattā vijjamānākāro. Vijjati, saṁvijjati. Jātavedo, vijjā, avijjā, vidito.
anya-e0804n2:117_1: So hi jātova vedayati dhūmajāluṭṭhānena paññāyati, tasmā jātavedoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:117_2: Vijjāti dhammānaṁ sabhāvaṁ viditaṁ karotīti vijjā, ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:117_3: Avijjāti khandhānaṁ rāsaṭṭhaṁ, āyatanānaṁ āyatanaṭṭhaṁ, dhātūnaṁ suññaṭṭhaṁ, saccānaṁ tathaṭṭhaṁ, indriyānaṁ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṁ aviditaṁ karotīti avijjā.
anya-e0804n2:117_4: Dukkhādīnaṁ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṁ catubbidhaṁ atthaṁ aviditaṁ karotīti avijjā, moho.
anya-e0804n2:118_1: Ummādo nāma muyha naṁ vā sativippavāso vā cittavikkhepo vā.
anya-e0804n2:119_0: Appamādo amataṁ padaṁ, pamādo maccuno padaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:120_0: Appamattā na miyyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
anya-e0804n2:121_0: Mida sinehane. Mejjati. Mettā, metti, mittaṁ, mitto.
anya-e0804n2:122_1: Antarapubbo dhādhātu vijjamānassa vatthuno adassane vattati.
anya-e0804n2:123_2: Bujjhati, buddho, buddhi, buddhaṁ, bodho, bodhi.
anya-e0804n2:123_4: Sakalaṁ buddho, buddhavā, vibodheti, bodhetā, buddho, vibuddho iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:124_0: Tatra buddhoti bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho.
anya-e0804n2:124_1: Atha vā pāramitāparibhāvitāya paññāya sabbampi ñeyyaṁ abujjhīti buddho.
anya-e0804n2:124_2: Keci pana kammenapi buddhasaddassa siddhaṁ icchantā evaṁ nibbacanaṁ karonti “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavāti adhigataguṇavisesehi khīṇāsavehi bujjhitabboti buddho”ti.
anya-e0804n2:124_7: Evaṁ bodho bodhi ca, sabbametaṁ paññāyādhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:125_1: Bodhīti hi rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi nibbānampi evaṁpaṇṇattiko puggalopi vuccati, tathā hi “bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca, “antarā ca bodhiṁ antarā ca gaya”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:125_5: “Bodhi bhante rājakumāro bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti “ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccatī”ti ca āgataṭṭhāne evaṁpaṇṇattiko puggalo.
anya-e0804n2:127_0: Rukkhe magge ca nibbāne, ñāṇe sabbaññutāya ca;
anya-e0804n2:130_0: Ettha ca koci payogo tumantādīni ca rūpāni vuccante –
anya-e0804n2:130_3: Bujjhituṁ, buddhuṁ, bujjhitvā, bujjhitvāna, bujjhituna, buddhiya, buddhiyāna, buddhā, buddhāna” iti bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:131_0: Tatra asambuddhanti parehi aññātaṁ, “asambodha”ntipi pāṭho, paresaṁ bodhetuṁ ayuttanti attho.
anya-e0804n2:132_0: Keci pana “nāmarūpaparicchede ‘bodhimaggena budhvā’ti ca, “budhvā bodhitale yamāha sugato’ti ca dhakāravakārasaññogavato padassa dassanato tvāpaccayantabhāvato ca dhakāravakārasaṁyogavasena “budhvā”ti padasiddhi icchitabbā”ti vadanti, taṁ tādisassa padarūpassa buddhavacane adassanato ca, buddhavacanassa ananukūlatāya ca, parisuddhe ca porāṇapotthake vakārasaṁyogavigatassa “bodhimaggena buddhā”tica, “buddhā bodhitale”ti ca padassa dassanato na gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:132_1: Tathā hi na tādiso pāṭho buddhavacanassa anukūlo hotīti.
anya-e0804n2:132_2: Na hi buddhavacane vassasatampi vassasahassampi pariyesantā tādisaṁ vakāradhakārasaññogapadaṁ passissanti.
anya-e0804n2:132_4: Tañhi sakkaṭaganthe kataparicayabhāvena vañcitehi vidūhi icchitaṁ, na saddhammanītividūhi.
anya-e0804n2:133_2: Laddhāna pubbāpariyaṁ visesaṁ, adassanaṁ maccurājassa gacche.
anya-e0804n2:136_4: Iti “viddhā laddhā laddhāna diṭṭhā”ti padāni tvāpaccayena saddhiṁ gatānipi saññogavasena vakārapaṭibaddhāni na honti, tasmā “buddhā buddhāna” iccetānipi “laddhā laddhāna” iccādīni viya parihīnavakārasaññogāni eva gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:136_5: Ye “budhvā”ti rūpaṁ icchanti paṭhanti ca, maññe te tvāpaccayo vañceti, tena te vañcanaṁ pāpuṇanti, tasmā tādisaṁ rūpaṁ aggahetvā yo saddanītiyaṁ saddavinicchayo vutto, soyeva āyasmantehi sārato paccetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:137_2: Tathā hi bodhanasadduccāraṇena jānanaṁ vikasanaṁ niddakkhayo ca gahito, tasmā “budha ñāṇe, budha vikasane, budha niddakkhaye”ti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0804n2:137_3: Bujjhati bhagavā, dhamme bujjhati, pabujjhati, padumaṁ bujjhati.
anya-e0804n2:137_4: Puriso buddho, pabuddho, bodhati, pabodhati iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:138_2: Nevassa maddī bhākuṭi, na sandhiyati na rodati.
anya-e0804n2:138_3: Na sandhiyatīti idaṁ aññehi pakaraṇehi asādhāraṇaṁ divādirūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:139_0: Dhanu yācane. Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidharassa hadayaṁ dhaniyyati. Idampi asādhāraṇaṁ divādirūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:141_1: Yodho, yuddhaṁ, caraṇāyudho, yakārassa vakārabhāve “āvudha”nti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:142_2: Kuddho atthaṁ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṁ na passati.
anya-e0804n2:143_2: Suddhi, visuddhi, sujjhanaṁ, suddho, visuddho, parisuddho.
anya-e0804n2:145_0: Radha hiṁsāyaṁ. Rajjhati, virajjhati, aparajjhati. Aparādho.
anya-e0804n2:146_4: Accantaṁ sādhetabbanti sādhu, laddhakaṁ sundaraṁ dānasīlādi.
anya-e0804n2:147_2: Khaṇa viddha, vidhu, vijjhanako, viddho, paṭividdho, vijjhanaṁ, vedho, paṭivedho, vijjhitvā, viddhā, viddhāna.
anya-e0804n2:148_4: Ijjhanti vā sattā etāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti iddhi.
anya-e0804n2:149_0: Gidhuabhikaṅkhāyaṁ. Gijjhati, gijjho. Gaddho. Gaddhabādhipubbo. Kāmagiddho na jānāsi. Gedho.
anya-e0804n2:151_2: Puriso aññassa purisassa kriyaṁ anuvidhīyati tatrāyaṁ pāḷi –
anya-e0804n2:156_0: Tattha anuruddhoti anurujjhati paṇītaṁ paṇītaṁ vatthuṁ kāmetīti anuruddho.
anya-e0804n2:156_2: Ayaṁ pāḷi “so uppannaṁ lābhaṁ anurujjhati, alābhe paṭivirujjhatī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:157_0: Byadha tāḷane. Byajjhati. Byādho. Byādhoti luddho. Taṁ taṁ migaṁ byajjhati tāḷeti hiṁsatīti byādho.
anya-e0804n2:159_3: “Maññanā, maññitattaṁ, māno, ahaṅkāro, unnati, ketu, paggaho, avalepo”ti pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n2:160_4: Janayati, sukhaṁ janeti, janayatīti janako, pitā, yo koci vā nibbattetā.
anya-e0804n2:160_6: Tattha “janeti janayatī”ti rūpāni curādigaṇaṁ patvā suddhakatturūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:161_1: Īkārantoyaṁ akammako dhātu, vipubbo ce, sakammako.
anya-e0804n2:161_4: Jananaṁ jāti, “sañjāti, nibbatti, abhinibbatti, khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo”ti pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n2:161_5: Itthī puttaṁ vijāyati, itthī puttaṁ vijātā.
anya-e0804n2:162_4: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokile sote paṭihaññati.
anya-e0804n2:162_6: Bhūvādigaṇaṁ pana patvā “lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṁ, na jātarūpena hananti loha”nti pāḷiyaṁ “haññatī”ti padaṁ kammapadaṁ, jātarūpaṁ lohena kammārehi haññatīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:162_7: “Hanantī”ti padaṁ kattupadaṁ, lohaṁ jātarūpena kammārā hanantīti hi attho.
anya-e0804n2:163_3: Imassa pana “rūpa rūpakriyāya”nti curādigaṇe ṭhitassa “rūpeti rūpayatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:164_5: Sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jighacchāyapi ruppati, pipāsāyapi ruppati, ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassenapi ruppati, ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā ‘rupa’nti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:165_0: Tattha ruppatīti kuppati ghaṭṭiyati pīḷiyati, bhijjatīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:165_1: Bhijjatīti vikāraṁ āpajjati, vikārāpatti ca sītādisannipāte visadisarūpappavattiyeva.
anya-e0804n2:165_2: Ettha ca kuppatīti etena kattuatthe rūpapadasiddhiṁ dasseti, ghaṭṭiyati pīḷiyatīti etehi kammatthe.
anya-e0804n2:165_3: Kopādikriyāyeva hi ruppanakriyāti, so pana kattubhūto kammabhūto ca attho bhijjamāno nāma hotīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṁ “bhijjatīti attho”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:166_0: Atha vā ruppatīti rūpanti kammakattutthe rūpapadasiddhi vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:166_1: Vikāro hi ruppananti vuccati, teneva bhijjatīti atthoti kammakattutthena bhijjatīti saddena atthaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0804n2:166_2: Tattha yadā kammatthe “ruppatī”ti padaṁ, tadā “sītenā”tiādi kattuatthe karaṇavacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:166_3: Yadā pana “ruppatī”ti padaṁ kattuatthe kammakattuatthe vā, tadā hetumhi karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:167_0: Rūpasaddo khandha bhava nimitta paccaya sarīra vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n2:167_1: Ayañhi “yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha rūpakkhandhe vattati.
anya-e0804n2:167_4: “Sarūpā bhikkhave uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no arūpā”ti ettha paccaye.
anya-e0804n2:167_5: “Ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti ettha sarīre.
anya-e0804n2:167_6: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti ettha vaṇṇe.
anya-e0804n2:168_0: Khandhe bhave nimitte ca, sarīre paccayepi ca;
anya-e0804n2:170_0: Kupa kope. Kuppati. Kuppanti vātassapi eritassa. Kopo, pakopo. Vacīpakopaṁ rakkheyya.
anya-e0804n2:177_2: Lubbhanaṁ, lobho, lubbhitvā, lubbhitvāna, lubbhiya, lubbhiyāna, olubbhitvā, olubbhitvāna, olubbhiya, olubbhiyāna, lubbhituṁ, olubbhituṁ.
anya-e0804n2:178_0: Tattha lobhoti lubbhanti tena sattā, sayaṁ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho.
anya-e0804n2:178_1: Ettha pana “lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṁ rāgo taṇhā tasiṇā mucchā ejā vanaṁ vanatho” iccādīni lobhassa bahunāmāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:180_0: Samu upasame. Cittaṁ sammati, upasammati, vūpasammati, samaṇo, santi, santo.
anya-e0804n2:181_0: Ettha samaṇoti sammati santacitto bhavatīti samaṇo.
anya-e0804n2:181_1: Kāritavasena pana kilese sameti upasametīti samaṇoti nibbacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:183_1: “Ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā”tiādīsu niruddhabhāve.
anya-e0804n2:183_2: “Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto”tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:187_0: Damu damane. Dammati. Danto, damo, damanaṁ. Kārite “cittaṁ dameti, damayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:188_2: Vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṁvaro “damo”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n2:188_3: “Yadi saccā damā cāgā, khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti ettha paññā “damo”ti vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:188_4: “Dānena damena saṁyamena saccavajjenā”ti ettha uposathakammaṁ “damo”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:191_2: Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage. Yāyanto.
anya-e0804n2:192_0: Ettha pariyāyasaddassa atthuddhāro vuccate, pariyāyasaddo vāradesanākāraṇesu samantato gantabbaṭṭhāne ca sadise ca vattati.
anya-e0804n2:192_1: “Kassa nu kho ānanda ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu hi vāre vattati.
anya-e0804n2:192_3: “Imināpi kho te rājañña pariyāyena evaṁ hotū”tiādīsu kāraṇe.
anya-e0804n2:196_0: Vilī vilīnabhāve. Sappi vilīyati. Kārite vilāpayati.
anya-e0804n2:202_0: Sā antakammani. Siyati anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasanti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:203_0: Sā assādane. Rasaṁ sāyati. Sāyitaṁ, sāyanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:204_0: Si pāṇippasave. Sūyati, pasūyati. Pasūtā gāvī.
anya-e0804n2:207_4: Apica malīnatāpi kilisasaddena vuccati, kiliṭṭhavatthaṁ paridahati.
anya-e0804n2:209_0: Līsa appībhāve. Lissati. Leso. “Lisa lesane”tipi paṭhanti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n2:210_0: Tasa pipāsāyaṁ. Tassati, paritassati. Paritassanā, tasiṇā, tasito.
anya-e0804n2:211_0: Dusa dosane. Dussati. Doso, dosanaṁ, dosito.
anya-e0804n2:212_0: Dusa appītiyaṁ. Dussati, padussati. Doso, padoso, duṭṭho, paduṭṭho, dūsako, dūsito, dūsanā.
anya-e0804n2:213_0: Asu khepe. Khepo khipanaṁ. Assati. Nirassatiādiyati ca dhammaṁ. Issāso.
anya-e0804n2:214_0: Ettha ca nirassatīti chaḍḍeti satthāraṁ tathā dhammakkhānādīni.
anya-e0804n2:214_1: Issāsoti usuṁ assati khipatīti issāso, dhanuggaho.
anya-e0804n2:216_0: Ettha ca yena vinayakammena “nissāya te vatthabba”nti niyassiyati bhajāpiyatīti niyaso bālaṁ, taṁ niyasakammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n2:216_1: “Karohi me yakkha niyasakamma”nti ettha pana niggahakammaṁ niyasakammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n2:218_0: Vasa sadde. Sakuṇo vassati. Adhamo migajātānaṁ, siṅgālo tāta vassati. Maṇḍūko vassati.
anya-e0804n2:221_2: Santuṭṭhi, santoso, tosanaṁ, tuṭṭhabbaṁ, tussitabbaṁ, tusitā.
anya-e0804n2:222_3: Bhāve “bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vā, so pahīyissatī”ti ca “rāgo pahīyatī”ti ca rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:222_5: “Rāgo pahīyatī”ti idaṁ pana “hā cāge”ti vuttassa bhūvādigaṇikadhātussa rūpaṁ “rāgaṁ pajahatī”ti kattupadassa dassanato.
anya-e0804n2:223_0: Naha bandhane. Nayhati. Upanayhati. Sannayhati. Sannāho. Sannaddho.
anya-e0804n2:224_5: Ettha ca momūhoti avisadatāya momūho, mahāmūḷhoti attho.
anya-e0804n2:226_5: Ettha ca sīsaṁ nhātoti sīsaṁ dhovitvā nhātoti attho gahetabbo porāṇehi anumatattā.
anya-e0804n2:228_2: Tathā hi “viriḷitoti lajjito”ti atthasaṁvaṇṇakā garū vadanti “lajjanākārappatto”ti ca.
anya-e0804n2:229_0: Divādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:233_4: Paccassosi, paccassosuṁ” iccādīni, “suṇissati, sossati” iccādīni ca bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:233_7: sāvako, soto, suṇaṁ, suṇanto, suṇamāno, suyyamāno, savanaṁ, sutaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:233_10: Suṇitvā, suṇiya, suṇiyāna, sutvā, sutvāna. Kārite –
anya-e0804n2:234_0: Tattha sāvakoti antevāsiko, so duvidho āgatapphalo anāgatapphalo ca, tattha āgatapphalo savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātoti “sāvako”ti vuccati, itaro garūnaṁ ovādaṁ suṇātīti “sāvako”ti.
anya-e0804n2:235_0: Ettha sutasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vadāma saddhiṁ sotasaddassa atthuddhārena.
anya-e0804n2:235_1: Sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca anupapadena, sutasaddo ca –
anya-e0804n2:242_0: “Sotāyatanaṁ, sotadhātu, sotindriya”ntiādīsu sotasaddo maṁsasote dissati, “sotena saddaṁ sutvā”tiādīsu sotaviññāṇe.
anya-e0804n2:242_2: “Yāni sotāni lokasminti, yāni etāni sotāni mayā kittitāni pakittitāni ācikkhitāni desitāni paññapitāni paṭṭhapitāni vivaritāni vibhattāni uttānīkatāni pakāsitāni.
anya-e0804n2:242_4: Taṇhāsoto diṭṭhisoto kilesasoto duccaritasoto avijjāsoto”tiādīsu pañcasu dhammesu.
anya-e0804n2:242_5: “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṁ dārukkhandhaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu udakadhārāyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:242_6: “Ariyassetaṁ āvuso aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṁ, yadidaṁ soto”tiādīsu ariyamagge.
anya-e0804n2:242_7: “Purisassa ca viññāṇasotaṁ pajānāti ubhayato abbocchinnaṁ idhaloke patiṭṭhitañca paraloke patiṭṭhitañcā”tiādīsu cittasantatiyanti.
anya-e0804n2:243_0: Soṇoti sunakho. So hi sāmikassa vacanaṁ suṇātīti soṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:245_0: Sunakho sārameyyo ca, suṇo sūno ca kukkuro;
anya-e0804n2:246_0: Soṇo svāno suvāno ca, sāḷuro migadaṁsano.
anya-e0804n2:248_0: Sunakhī kukkurī sī’ti, ime itthīsu vattare.
anya-e0804n2:251_0: Kukkuroti ayaṁ tattha, bālakāle ravena ve;
anya-e0804n2:253_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā kukkurajātake “ye kukkurā rājakulamhi vaḍḍhā, koleyyakā vaṇṇabalūpapannā”tiimasmiṁpadese evamatthaṁ vaṇṇayiṁsu “ye kukkurāti ye sunakhā.
anya-e0804n2:253_1: Yathā hi taruṇopi passāvo pūtimuttanti tadahujātopi siṅgālo “jarasiṅgālo’ti, komalāpi gaḷācīlatā ‘pūtilatā’ti, suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo ‘pūtikāyo’ti vuccati, evameva vassasatikopi sunakho ‘kukkuro’ti vuccati, tasmā mahallakā kāyūpapannāpi te ‘kukkurā’tveva vuttā”ti.
anya-e0804n2:256_1: So hi parahitaṁ sakahitañca kātuṁ sakkuṇātīti sakko.
anya-e0804n2:256_3: Tathā hi “atha kho mahānāmo sakko”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:256_5: Sakyā vata bho kumārā paramasakyā vata bho kumārā”ti vacanamupādāya sabbepi sakyakule jātā “sakyā”ti ca “sākiyā”ti ca “sakkā”ti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0804n2:256_6: Ettha svādittepi anekassaradhātuto ekova uṇāpaccayo hoti, na ṇu ṇāpaccayāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:257_0: Khīkhaye. Khīṇoti. Khīṇāti. Khīṇā jāti. Khīṇo. Ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo.
anya-e0804n2:259_0: Ci caye. Ṇakārassa nakārattaṁ. Pākāraṁ cinoti. Citaṁ kusalaṁ. Ceto puggalo.
anya-e0804n2:261_0: Rādha sādha saṁsiddhiyaṁ. Rādhuṇāti. Sādhuṇāti. Rādhanaṁ. Ārādhanaṁ. Sādhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:262_0: Pī pītiyaṁ. Pīṇoti, pīṇāti. Pīti, piyo.
anya-e0804n2:264_0: Tattha pattoti pasaddo upasaggo “pappotī”ti ettha pasaddo viya.
anya-e0804n2:264_1: Tathā hi “patto”ti ettha pāpuṇīti atthe papubbassa apadhātussa pakāre lutte tapaccayassa dvibhāvo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:264_2: Tattha na abhisambhuṇātīti na sampāpuṇāti, na sādhetīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0804n2:265_0: Khipa khepe. Khipuṇāti. Khippaṁ. Khippanti macchapañjaro.
anya-e0804n2:268_0: Ettha ca sabbaguyhesu nimiyati pakkhipiyatīti mitto.
anya-e0804n2:268_1: “Mitto have sattapadena hotī”ti vacanaṁ pana vohāravasena vuttaṁ, na atthavasena.
anya-e0804n2:268_2: Vucceyya ce, yo koci avissāsiko attano paṭiviruddhopi ca mitto nāma bhaveyya, na cevaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:268_3: Evañca pana daṭṭhabbaṁ “sattapadavītihāramattenapi saha gacchanto saha gacchantassa piyavācānicchāraṇena aññamaññaṁ ālāpasallāpakaraṇamattena mitto nāma hotīti vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:268_5: Daḷhavissāso mitto nāma na bhaveyyāti mittassa guṇapasaṁsāvasena evaṁ vutta”nti.
anya-e0804n2:269_0: Vu saṁvaraṇe. Vuṇoti, vuṇāti, saṁvuṇoti, saṁvuṇāti. Paṇḍito sīlasaṁvuto.
anya-e0804n2:270_0: Su abhisave. Abhisavo nāma pīḷanaṁ manthanaṁ sandhānaṁ sinhānaṁ vā. Suṇoti, suṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:273_0: Na hi nūnāyaṁ sā khujjā, labhati jivhāya chedanaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:276_0: Vusa pāgabbiye. Pāgabbiyaṁ nāma kāyavācāmanehi pagabbabhāvo. Vusuṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:279_0: Ettha pana asamānantattepi samānatthānaṁ samodhānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:280_0: Tika tiga sagha dikkha kivi ciri jiri dāsa du hiṁsāyaṁ. Tikuṇāti. Tiguṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:281_0: Suvādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:286_0: Khi gatiyaṁ. Khiṇāti. Atikhiṇo saro. Khaṁ, khāni. Nakārassa ṇakārattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:287_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “cāpātikhiṇāti cāpato atikhiṇā cāpā vinimuttāti attho”ti padatthavivaraṇaṁ kataṁ, tampi gatatthaññeva sandhāya adhippāyatthavasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:288_11: “Sañcayo rāsi samūho piṇḍo gaṇo saṅgho kadambo vaggo karo ghaṭā”iccevamādayo pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n2:289_5: Jitavā, jitāvī, jitabbo, jeyyo, jayanaṁ, jitaṁ, vijitaṁ, jayo, parājayanaṁ, parājayo.
anya-e0804n2:289_8: Jayo hi buddhassa sirīmato ayaṁ, mārassa ca pāpimato parājayo.
anya-e0804n2:290_0: Tattha jetāti jinātīti jetā, yo koci puggalo.
anya-e0804n2:290_4: Iti pāpake akusale dhamme mārādayo ca arayo ajinīti jino.
anya-e0804n2:291_0: “Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhayaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:292_0: Jitā me pāpakā dhammā, tasmāhaṁ upaka jino”ti,
anya-e0804n2:294_0: Jinasaddo hi kevalo sabbaññumhi pavattati, sopapado pana paccekabuddhādīsu tamhi ca yathārahaṁ pavattati.
anya-e0804n2:294_1: “Paccekajino, odhijino, anodhijino, vipākajino, avipākajino”ti imānettha nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0804n2:295_1: Jināti, na jināti na jāpaye, jino rathassaṁ maṇikuṇḍale ca, putte ca dāre ca tatheva jino.
anya-e0804n2:296_9: Īdisesu ṭhānesu ñeyyasaddo ekantena napuṁsako, vāccaliṅgatte sabbaliṅgiko, yathā?
anya-e0804n2:296_13: Ñeyyo puriso, ñeyyā itthī, ñeyyaṁ dhananti ca.
anya-e0804n2:297_0: Thu abhitthave. Thunāti. Abhitthunāti. Thuti, abhitthuti. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuto, abhitthuto.
anya-e0804n2:305_0: Ettha mittaddūti mittaṁ dunāti hiṁsati dubbhatīti mittaddu.
anya-e0804n2:305_1: Atra “vedā na tāṇāya bhavanti tassa, mittadduno bhūnahuno narassā”ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:305_2: Dumoti duniyati gehasambhārādiatthāya hiṁsiyati chindiyati, paṇṇapupphādiatthikehi vā paṇṇapupphādiharaṇena pīḷiyatīti dumo.
anya-e0804n2:306_0: Dhū kampane. Dhunāti. Dhūmo, dhonā, dhono, dhuto. Dhunanto vākacīrāni, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
anya-e0804n2:307_1: Dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya vitakke pañcasu kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāyaṁ pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n2:307_2: “Kodho dhūmo bhasmāni mosavajja”nti ettha hi kodhe vattati.
anya-e0804n2:307_4: “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno hotī”ti ettha vitakke.
anya-e0804n2:310_0: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsito,
anya-e0804n2:312_2: “Dhajo rathassa paññāno, dhūmo paññānamaggino”ti ettha pakatidhūme. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:315_1: Vuttañhetaṁ niddese “dhonā vuccati paññā, yā paññā pajānanā sammādiṭṭhi, kiṁkāraṇā dhonāti vuccati paññā?
anya-e0804n2:315_2: Yaṁ tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca, vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca.
anya-e0804n2:315_4: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṁ dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca, taṁkāraṇā dhonā vuccati paññā”ti.
anya-e0804n2:315_5: “Dhonassa hi natthi kuhiñci loke, pakappitā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesū”ti ayamettha pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:315_6: Atra dhonā assa atthīti dhono, tassa dhonassāti nibbacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:316_2: Imasmiṁ ṭhāne dhātuyā ākhyātatte ekantena antalopo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:316_3: Sobhitattheragāthāyaṁ pana anāgatavacane ukārassa vuddhivasena “ahaṁ monena monissa”nti rūpantarañca dissati.
anya-e0804n2:316_6: Tattha monanti kiñcāpi “na monena muni hotī”ti ettha tuṇhībhāvo “mona”nti vuccati, tathāpi idha “ñāṇe”ti vacanato na so adhippeto, ñāṇamevādhippetaṁ, tasmā moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṁ maggañāṇamonampi gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:316_7: Munīti munāti jānāti hitāhitaṁ paricchindatīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:316_8: Atha vā khandhādiloke tulaṁ āropetvā minanto viya “ime ajjhattikā khandhā, ime bāhirā”tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munātīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:318_0: Yo ca tulaṁva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n2:319_0: Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa muni tena so muni;
anya-e0804n2:320_0: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:321_1: Munīti monaṁ vuccati ñāṇaṁ, kāyamoneyyādīsu vā aññataraṁ, tena samannāgatattā puggalo “munī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:321_2: So panesa agāriyamuni anagāriyamuni sekkhamuni asekkhamuni paccekamuni munimunīti anekavidho.
anya-e0804n2:321_9: Tathā hi āyasmāpi sāriputto āha “munīti vuccati tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho”ti.
anya-e0804n2:322_0: Pū pavane. Pavanaṁ sodhanaṁ. Punāti. Puññaṁ, putto, dantapoṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:323_0: Ettha ca puññanti attano kārakaṁ punāti sodhetīti puññaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:323_1: Atha vā yattha sayaṁ uppannaṁ taṁsantānaṁ punāti visodhetīti puññaṁ. Kintaṁ?
anya-e0804n2:323_4: Puttoti attano kulaṁ punāti sodhetīti putto.
anya-e0804n2:323_5: Evañca sati hīnajaccānaṁ caṇḍālādīnaṁ putto nāma na bhaveyyāti na vattabbaṁ saddānamatthakathanassa nānappakārena pavattito, tasmā attano pitu hadayaṁ pūretīti puttoti evamādināpi nibbacanaṁ gahetabbameva.
anya-e0804n2:324_0: Putto ca nāma atrajo khetrajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidho.
anya-e0804n2:324_1: Tattha attānaṁ paṭicca jāto atrajo nāma.
anya-e0804n2:324_2: Sayanapīṭhe pallaṅke ureti evamādīsu nibbatto khetrajo nāma.
anya-e0804n2:324_4: Posāpanatthāya dinno dinnako nāma dantapoṇanti dante punanti visodhenti etenāti dantapoṇaṁ, dantakaṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:325_2: Ettha ca pītīti pīṇanaṁ pīti, tappanaṁ kantīti ca vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0804n2:325_4: Idaṁ pana hetukattuvasena piṇayatīti pīti, tappetīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:326_0: Sā panesā khuddakāpīti khaṇikāpīti okkantikāpīti ubbegāpīti pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā hoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_1: Tattha khuddakāpīti sarīre lomahaṁsanamattameva kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_3: Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṁ vīci viya kāyaṁ okkamitvā okkamitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0804n2:326_4: Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṁ uddhaggaṁ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇā hoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_5: Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṁ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anupariphuṭaṁ hoti, evaṁ pañcavidhā pīti, sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇattā “piṇātī”ti pītīti suddhakattuvasenapi vattuṁ yujjati.
anya-e0804n2:326_6: Ettha “piyāyati, pitā, piyo, pemo”tiādīni pīdhātuyā eva rūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:327_1: Mānaṁ, parimāṇaṁ, mattaṁ, mattā, mano, vimānaṁ, minitabbaṁ, metabbaṁ, chāyā metabbā.
anya-e0804n2:328_0: Ettha manoti ekāya nāḷiyā ekāya ca tulāya minamāno viya ārammaṇaṁ mināti paricchindatīti mano.
anya-e0804n2:328_1: Visesato miniyate paricchindiyateti vimānaṁ, devānaṁ puññabalena nibbattabyamhaṁ devaniketaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:328_2: Yaṁ vimānaṁ upasobhitaṁ, pabhāsatimidaṁ byamhanti ca ādinā thomiyati.
anya-e0804n2:330_1: Macchassa hi “mīno maccho ambujo vārijo vāricaro”ti anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n2:330_2: Visesanāmāni pana “amaro khaliso candakulo kandaphali indaphali indavalo kuliso vāmi kuṅkutalo kaṇḍiko sakulo maṅguro siṅgī satavaṅko rohito pāṭhīno kāṇo savaṅko pāvuso” iccevamādīni, “timi timiṅgalo” iccevamādīni ca bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:330_3: Kumīnanti kucchitenākārena macche minanti hiṁsanti etenāti kumīnaṁ, macchabandhanapañjaro.
anya-e0804n2:335_0: Ettha munīti attano cittaṁ munāti mavati bandhati rāgadosādivasaṁ gantuṁ na detīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:336_0: Ri gatidesanesu. Rikāti. Reṇu. Nakārassa ṇattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:337_0: Lī silese. Lināti, nilināti. Līnaṁ, sallīnaṁ, paṭisallānaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:338_3: idaṁ kho āvuso cīvaraṁ maṁ uddissa viyyati. Vītaṁ. Suvītaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:338_5: Kārite “vāyāpeti, tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpessāmā’ti cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ” iccevamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:339_0: Vī hiṁsāyaṁ. Vināti. Veṇu. Veṇūti vaṁso.
anya-e0804n2:340_0: Lū chedane. Lunāti. Loṇaṁ, kusalaṁ, bālo, lūto.
anya-e0804n2:341_0: Ettha ca loṇanti lunāti vītarasabhāvaṁ vināseti sarasabhāvaṁ karotīti loṇaṁ, lavaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:341_1: Kuso viya hatthappadesaṁ akusaladhamme lunātīti kusalaṁ, anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇo dhammo.
anya-e0804n2:341_2: Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike dve atthe lunātīti bālo, avidvā.
anya-e0804n2:341_5: Yūsaṁ pātuṁ paṭaṅgamakkhikādīnaṁ jīvitaṁ lunātīti lūto.
anya-e0804n2:343_0: Ettha sīmāti sinīyate samaggena saṅghena kammavācāya bandhiyateti sīmā.
anya-e0804n2:343_3: Sināti bandhati kese moḷikaraṇavasena etthāti sīsaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:345_0: Su hiṁsāyaṁ. Suṇāti. Parasu. Paraṁ suṇanti hiṁsanti etenāti parasu.
anya-e0804n2:349_0: Ettha ca kilesoti rāgādayopi dukkhampi vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:356_0: Kiyādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:364_0: Idāni gahādigaṇo vuccate. Ettheke evaṁ maññanti.
anya-e0804n2:367_0: Yato ppaṇhā parā heyyuṁ, dhātuto jinasāsane;
anya-e0804n2:368_0: Tepi aññe na vijjanti, aññatra gahadhātuyā.
anya-e0804n2:370_0: Pakkhipiṁsu gaṇe evaṁ, na vadiṁsu gahādikaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:371_0: Na tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ dhīro, gaṇheyya suvicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0804n2:372_0: Yato kaccāyane vutto, gahādīnaṁ gaṇo visuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:373_0: “Gahādito ppaṇhā” iti, lakkhaṇaṁ vadatā hi so;
anya-e0804n2:375_0: Sace visuṁ gahādīnaṁ, gaṇo nāma na labbhati;
anya-e0804n2:377_0: “Gahato ppaṇhā” icceva, vattabbaṁ atha vā pana;
anya-e0804n2:379_0: Yasmā tathā na vuttañca, na katañcekalakkhaṇaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:380_0: Tasmā ayaṁ visuṁyeva, gaṇo icceva ñāyati.
anya-e0804n2:386_0: Sappayogaṁ gahādīnaṁ, gaṇaṁ vakkhāmi me suṇa.
anya-e0804n2:387_2: Upasaddo hettha na kiñci atthavisesaṁ vadati.
anya-e0804n2:387_3: Atha vā kāyena cittena vā upagantvā ādānaṁ gahaṇaṁ upādānanti samīpattho upasaddo.
anya-e0804n2:387_4: Katthaci hi upasaddo ādānasaddasahito daḷhaggahaṇe vattati “kāmupādāna”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0804n2:387_5: Idha pana daḷhaggahaṇaṁ vā hotu sithilaggahaṇaṁ vā, yaṁ kiñci gahaṇaṁ upādānameva, tasmā gahadhātu gahaṇe vattatīti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:387_14: Kārite “gaṇhāpeti, gaṇhāpayati, aññataraṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ uggaṇhāpenti, saddhiṁ amaccasahassena gaṇhāpetvā.
anya-e0804n2:387_22: “Gehaṁ, gāho, pariggaho, saṅgāhako, saṅgahetā” iccādīni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:388_2: Gaṇhasī”ti ca ādinā nayena sabbāsu vibhattīsu sabbathā padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n2:388_3: Ākārekārānantaratyantapadānaṁ “gaṇhāti gaṇhāpetī”tiādinā yathāsambhavaṁ padamālā yojetabbā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṁ vajjetvā.
anya-e0804n2:389_0: Imāni pana pasiddhāni kānici ajjatanīrūpāni “aggahī mattikāpattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:390_3: Uṇhasaddo “uṇhaṁ bhattaṁ bhuñjatī”tiādīsu dabbamapekkhati, “sītaṁ uṇhaṁ paṭihanatī”tiādīsu pana guṇaṁ uṇhabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0804n2:391_0: Tasa vipāsāyaṁ. Taṇhā. Kenaṭṭhena taṇhā? Tassati paritassatīti atthena.
anya-e0804n2:392_0: Jusi pītisevanesu. Juṇho samayo. Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto.
anya-e0804n2:393_0: Tattha juṇhoti joseti lokassa pītiṁsomanassañca uppādetīti juṇho.
anya-e0804n2:394_2: Jotati sayaṁ nippabhāpi samānā candatārakappabhāsenapi dibbati virocati sappabhā hotīti juṇhā.
anya-e0804n2:395_0: Sā tanukaraṇe. Saṇhavācā. Siyati tanukariyati, na pharusabhāvena kakkasā kariyatīti saṇhā.
anya-e0804n2:396_2: Siyati sayaṁ sukhumabhāvena atisukhumampi atthaṁ antaṁ karoti nipphattiṁ pāpetīti saṇhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:397_0: Tija nisāne. Nisānaṁ tikkhatā. Tiṇho parasu. Titikkhatīti tiṇho.
anya-e0804n2:398_1: Attano hitamāsīsantehi seviyateti sippaṁ, yaṁ kiñci jīvitahetu sikkhitabbaṁ sippāyatanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:398_3: suti sūramati byākaraṇaṁ chandoviciti nirutti jotisatthaṁ sikkhā mokkhañāṇaṁ kriyāvidhi dhanubbedo hatthisikkhā kāmatantaṁ assalakkhaṇaṁ purāṇaṁ itihāso nīti takko vejjakañcāti.
anya-e0804n2:399_0: Ku kucchāyaṁ. Kucchā garahā. Kaṇhā dhammā. Kaṇho puriso.
anya-e0804n2:400_0: Tattha kaṇhāti apabhassarabhāvakaraṇattā paṇḍitehi kucchitabbā garahitabbāti kaṇhā, akusaladhammā.
anya-e0804n2:400_1: Kāḷavaṇṇattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇādikaṁ upanidhāya kucchitabbo ninditabboti kaṇho, kāḷavaṇṇo.
anya-e0804n2:402_0: Kaṇhe bhūmippadesasmiṁ, na mayhaṁ manaso piyo”ti ca,
anya-e0804n2:411_0: Ākhyātatte ca nāmatte, ṇhāsaddo usato tathā.
anya-e0804n2:414_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi sāsane “taṇhāyatī”ti kriyāpadampi dissati, tathāpi tassa “pabbatāyati, mettāyatī”tiādīni viya nāmasmā vihitassa āyapaccayassa vasena siddhattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:414_1: “Taṇhāyatī”ti hi idaṁ ṇhāpaccayavatā tasadhātuto nipphannataṇhāsaddasmā parassa āyapaccayassa vasena nipphannaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:414_2: Tathā kiñcāpi rūpiyasaṁvohārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṁ “vāsiphalaṁ tāpetvā udakaṁ vā khīraṁ vā uṇhāpetī”ti imasmiṁ padese “uṇhāpetī”ti hetukattuvācakaṁ kriyāpadaṁ dissati, tathāpi tassa ṇhāpaccayavatā usadhātuto nipphannauṇhāsaddato vihitassa kāritasaññassa ṇāpepaccayassa vasena nipphannattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:414_3: “Uṇhāpetī”ti idaṁ vuttappakārauṇhāsaddato ṇāpepaccayavasena nipphannaṁ, etasmiṁ diṭṭhe “uṇhāpayatī”ti padampi diṭṭhameva hoti.
anya-e0804n2:415_0: Kiñca bhiyyo vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “uṇhāpetī”ti kāritapadassa diṭṭhattāyeva “uṇhatī”ti kattupadampi nayato diṭṭhameva hoti kattukāritapadānaṁ ekadhātumhi upalabbhamānattā, yathā?
anya-e0804n2:415_1: Gaṇhati, gaṇhāpeti, gacchati, gacchāpetīti, tasmā “usa dāhe”ti dhātussa “uṇhatī”ti rūpaṁ upalabbhatīti mantvā “uṇhatīti uṇha”nti nibbacanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:415_2: Iti ppapaccayo gahato ca aññato ca ekadhā labbhati, ṇhāpaccayo pana gahato usato ca dvidhā aññato ekadhā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:415_3: Kiñcāpettha evaṁ niyamo vutto, tathāpi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane aññānipi ekekassa dhātussa nāmikapadāni dve dve kriyāpadāni vicinitabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:415_4: Yena pana buddhavacanānurūpena nayena gahādigaṇe ādisaddena tasadhātādayo amhehi gahitā, imasmā nayā añño nayo pasatthataro natthi, ayameva pasatthataro, tasmā ayaṁ nīti sāsanaṭṭhitiyā āyasmantehi sādhukaṁ dhāretabbā vācetabbā ca.
anya-e0804n2:416_0: Gahādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:420_4: Atrāyaṁ pāḷi “yathā hi āsabhaṁ cammaṁ, pathabyā vitaniyyatī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:421_0: Tattha āyatananti āyabhūte dhamme tanoti vitthāretīti āyatanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:421_2: Tañhi kalalato paṭṭhāya kammādīhi yathāsambhavaṁ taniyyati vitthāriyati mahattaṁ pāpiyatīti “tanū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:421_3: “Tanu vapu sarīraṁ puṁ kāyo deho”tiādayo sarīravācakā saddā.
anya-e0804n2:421_5: Yañhi mahājano sarīranti vadati, taṁ paramatthato khandhapañcakamattameva, na tato attā vā attaniyaṁ vā upalabbhati.
anya-e0804n2:421_6: “Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanuttakaraṁ sakadāgāmimaggacitta”ntiādīsu pana tanusaddo appatthavācako, appatthavācakassa ca tassa kriyāpadaṁ na passāma, tasmā nipātapadena tena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:421_7: Tanusaddo nipātapadanti vuttaṭṭhānampi na passāma, nicchayena pana anipphannapāṭipadikoti gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:425_1: So hi atthānaṁ sahassampi muhuttena cintanasamatthatāya saparahitaṁ kātuṁ sakkotīti “sakko”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:425_2: Aññatra pana dhātūnaṁ avisaye taddhitavasena sakkaccaṁ dānaṁ adāsīti sakkoti evampi atthaṁ gahetvā sakkasaddo niruttinayena sādhetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:425_3: Vuttañhi bhagavatā “sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṁ dānaṁ adāsi, tasmā ‘sakko’ti vuccatī”ti. Sakkonto. Sakkontī.
anya-e0804n2:428_2: Tañhi tiṇiyate tiṇabhakkhehi goṇādīhi adiyate khādiyateti tiṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:430_0: Hanu apanayane. Apanayanaṁ anālāpakaraṇaṁ nibbacanatākaraṇaṁ. Hanoti. Hanute.
anya-e0804n2:432_0: Manu bodhane. Manoti. Manute. Mano. Manaṁ. Mānasaṁ. Manusso. Mānavo. Māṇavo.
anya-e0804n2:433_0: Ettha manoti manute bujjhatīti mano, evaṁ manaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:433_1: Imesaṁ pana dvinnaṁ manasaddānaṁ “yasmiṁ mano nivisati.
anya-e0804n2:433_2: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hotī”tiādīsu punnapuṁsakaliṅgatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n2:433_4: “Antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṁ carati mānaso”ti ettha hi rāgo mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:433_6: “Appattamānaso sekkho, kālaṁ kayirā jane suto”ti ettha arahattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_1: Mano eva mānasanti katvā cittaṁ mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_2: Anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_5: “Yena cakkhupasādena, rūpāni manu passatī”ti ettha hi “manū”ti satto vutto.
anya-e0804n2:436_6: Atha vā manūti paṭhamakappikakāle manussānaṁ mātāpibhuṭṭhāne ṭhito manunāmako puriso, yo sāsane “mahāsammatarājā”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n2:436_7: So hi sakalalokassa hitaṁ kātuṁ manute jānātīti “manū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:436_8: Yathābalaṁ attano hitaṁ manute jānātīti manusso, manassa vā ussannattā manusso.
anya-e0804n2:436_9: Atha vā vuttappakārassa manuno apaccaṁ manusso.
anya-e0804n2:436_10: Evaṁ mānavo māṇavo ca, nakārassa hi ṇakāre kate “māṇavo”ti rūpaṁ sijjhati.
anya-e0804n2:436_11: Keci panāhu “dantajanakārasahito mānavasaddo sabbasattasādhāraṇavacano, muddhajaṇakārasahito pana māṇavasaddo kucchitamūḷhāpaccavacano”ti, taṁ vīmaṁsitvā yuttañce, gahetabbaṁ, na panettha vattabbaṁ “māṇavasaddassa atthuddhāravacane idaṁ vacanaṁ virujjhatī”ti antarasaddassa atthuddhāre antaraantarikāsaddānampi āharaṇassa dassanato.
anya-e0804n2:437_1: cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttasmiñhi “subho māṇavotodeyyaputto”ti imasmiṁ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi “subhoti so kira dassanīyo ahosi pāsādiko, tenassa aṅgasubhatāya ‘subho’tveva nāmaṁ akaṁsu.
anya-e0804n2:437_2: ‘Māṇavo’ti pana taṁ taruṇakāle vohariṁsu, so mahallakakālepi teneva vohārena vohariyatī”ti evaṁ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa attho pakāsito, taṭṭīkāyampi garūhi “yaṁ apaccaṁ kucchitaṁ muddhaṁ vā, tattha loke māṇavavohāro, yebhuyyena ca sattā daharakāle muddhadhātukā hontīti vuttaṁ ‘taruṇakāle vohariṁsū”ti, evaṁ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa attho pakāsito.
anya-e0804n2:437_3: Idāni māṇavasaddassa atthuddhāro bhavati, māṇavoti sattopi coropi taruṇopi vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:437_4: “Coditā devadūtehi, ye pamajjanti māṇavā”tiādīsu hi satto “māṇavo”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n2:439_0: Ettha āpoti appoti taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ vissaratīti āpo.
anya-e0804n2:440_0: Mā parimāṇe. Minoti. Upamā, upamānaṁ, vimānaṁ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:441_0: Ettha ca yā accantaṁ na minoti na vicchindati, sā mānassa samīpe vattatīti upamā yathā “goṇo viya gavajo”ti.
anya-e0804n2:441_3: Ettha vītopamānanti imassa vītopamaṁ, nirupamanti attho.
anya-e0804n2:441_4: Atha vā upamānanti upametabbākāro “sīho viya bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0804n2:441_5: Ettha hi sīho upamā, bhagavā upameyyo tejoparakkamādīhi upametabbattā, tejoparakkamādayo upametabbākāro.
anya-e0804n2:441_6: Ettha pana sātisayattā kiñcāpi sīhassa tejādīhi bhagavato tejādiupametabbākāro natthi, tathāpi hīnūpamāvasena “sīho viya bhagavā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:441_7: Vimānanti utusamuṭṭhānattepi kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānattā kammena visesato miniyati paricchindiyatīti vimānaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:442_1: “Karoti, kayirati, kubbati, krubbati, pakaroti, upakaroti, apakaroti, paṭikaroti, nirākaroti, paṭisaṅkharoti, abhisaṅkharoti” iccevamādīni kattari bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:442_3: Tasmiṁyevaṭhāne rayakārānaṁ vipariyāye sati na dvebhāvo.
anya-e0804n2:442_4: Tathā īkārāgamaṭṭhāne “kariyyati, kayirati, karīyati, kayyati, pakarīyati, pakariyyati, paṭisaṅkhariyyati, abhisaṅkhariyyati” iccevamādīni kammani bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:443_0: Ettha ca kayiratīti padaṁ dvīsu ṭhānesu dissati kattari kamme ca.
anya-e0804n2:443_1: Tesa kattuvasena “puriso kammaṁ kayiratī”ti yojetabbaṁ, kammavasena pana ayaṁ pāḷi “kuṭi me kayirati adesitavatthukā”ti.
anya-e0804n2:443_2: Tattha ca kattuvasena vuttaṁ kattupadaṁ yirapaccayena siddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:443_3: Kammavasena pana vuttaṁ kammapadaṁ ikārāgamassa ādiantabhūtānaṁ rayakārānaṁ vipariyāyenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:443_4: “Kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārāpayatī”ti cattāri kāritarūpāni, yāni “hetukatturūpānī”ti vuccanti taddīpakattā.
anya-e0804n2:444_0: Idāni pana padamālā vattabbā, tatra paṭhamaṁ “kubbatī”ti padasseva padamālaṁ yojessāma sabbāsu vibhattīsu ekākārena yojetabbattā.
anya-e0804n2:444_1: “Karotī”ti okārānantaratyantapadassa pana “kāretī”ti ekārānantaratyantapadassa ca padamālaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ pacchā yojessāma ekākārena ayojetabbattā.
anya-e0804n2:447_2: Kubbasī”tiādinā vuttā ayaṁ padamālā pāḷinayadassanato edisī vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:447_3: Saddasatthavidū pana sāsanikā saddasattheyeva ādaraṁ katvā “kubbati, kubbasī”ti evaṁpakārāni rūpāni pāḷiyaṁ natthīti maññantā na icchanti.
anya-e0804n2:447_4: Tehi saddasatthe viya pāḷiyampi “asanto nānukubbantī”tiādīsu okārapaccayassādesabhūto ukāro sareyeva pare vakāraṁ pappotīti maññamānā “kubbanti, kubbante”tiādīniyeva rūpāni icchanti, parasarassābhāvato “kubbati, kubbasī”tiādīni pāḷiyaṁ natthīti na icchanti.
anya-e0804n2:447_5: Mayaṁ pana pāḷinayadassanato tāni rūpāni icchāma.
anya-e0804n2:447_6: Atra sotārānaṁ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṁ kiñci pāḷinayaṁ vadāma –
anya-e0804n2:447_7: “sīlavanto na kubbanti, bālo sīlāni kubbatī”ti ca, “kasmā bhavaṁ vijanamaraññanissito, tapo idha krubbatī”ti ca, “pharusāhi vācāhi pakrubbamāno”ti ca.
anya-e0804n2:447_9: Acinteyyo hi pāḷinayo, yebhuyyena saddasatthanayavidūro ca.
anya-e0804n2:447_10: Tathā hi yathā “agginiṁ sampajjalitaṁ pavisantī”ti pāḷigatidassanato “aggini, agginī, agginayo.
anya-e0804n2:447_12: Aggininā”ti padamālā kātabbā hoti, evameva “bālo sīlāni kubbatī”ti pāḷigatidassanato “kubbati, kubbanti.
anya-e0804n2:448_0: Yathā ca “bahumpetaṁ asabbhi jātavedā”ti pāḷigatidassanato “santo sabbhīhi saddhiṁ sataṁ dhammo na jaraṁ upetīti pavedayantī”ti aṭṭhakathāgatidassanato ca “sabbhi, sabbhī, sabbhayo.
anya-e0804n2:448_2: Sabbhinā”ti padamālā yojetabbā hoti, evameva “bālo sīlāni kubbatī”ti pāḷigatidassanato “kubbati, kubbanti.
anya-e0804n2:453_0: Taṁ vivāhaṁ asaṁyuttaṁ, kathaṁ amhe karomase”ti
anya-e0804n2:454_0: Pāḷidassanato “karomase”ti padaṁ kasmā idha na vuttaṁ, nanu karadhātuto paraṁ okāraṁ paṭicca āmasevacanassāvayavabhūto ākāro lopaṁ pappotīti?
anya-e0804n2:454_1: Tanna, “karomase”ti ettha “āmase”ti vacanassa abhāvato mavacanassa sabbhāvato.
anya-e0804n2:454_2: Ettha hi sekāro āgamo, tasmā “karomā”ti vattamānāvacanavasena attho gahetabbo, na pana pañcamīvacanavasena.
anya-e0804n2:454_3: Evaṁbhūto ca sekāro katthaci nāmikapadato paro hoti “ye keci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse.
anya-e0804n2:456_0: Sutaṁ netaṁ abhiṇhaso, tasmā evaṁ vademase”ti
anya-e0804n2:460_0: Ettha karāti puriso kammaṁ karīti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:460_1: “Āguṁ kara mahārāja, akaraṁ kammadukkaṭa”nti etthāpi “mahārāja bhavaṁ āguṁ karī”ti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:460_2: Evañhi sati ayaṁ payogo “maññe bhavaṁ patthayati, rañño bhariyaṁ patibbata”ntiādayo viya paṭhamapurisappayogo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:461_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana majjhimapurisappayogo vutto “āguṁ karāti mahārāja tvaṁ mahāparādhaṁ mahāpāpaṁ kari.
anya-e0804n2:461_1: Dukkaṭanti yaṁ kataṁ dukkaṭaṁ hoti,taṁ lāmakaṁ kammaṁ akara”nti, tasmā jātakaṭṭhakathāvasenāpi kadāci karaiti ca karīti ca akaranti ca majjhimapurisappayogo bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:461_2: Yebhuyyavasena pana “puriso kammaṁ kara, puriso kammaṁ kari, ahaṁ kammaṁ akara”nti paṭhamuttamapurisappayogo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n2:461_3: Ettha ca karaiti yathāvuttavibhattivasena, karīti ajjatanīvasena, akaranti hiyyattanīvasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:461_4: Tattha “karittho”ti padaṁ “aññaṁ bhattāraṁ pariyesa, mā kisittho mayā vinā”ti ettha “kisittho”ti padena samaṁ parokkhāyattanopadamajjhimapurisekavacanavasena, ediso pana nayo aññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṁ yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:462_0: Akā, akarā, akara iti rassapāṭhopi. Akaru.
anya-e0804n2:462_2: Akarāti puriso kammaṁ akāsīti atītakriyāvācako paṭhamapurisappayogo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n2:462_3: Tathā hi “rajjassa kira so bhīto, akarā ālaye bahū”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n2:462_4: “Mā metaṁ akarā kammaṁ, mā me udakamāharī”ti ettha pana santepi atītavācakapaṭṭhamapurisappayogabhāve māsaddayogato hiyyattanajjatanīvibhattiyo pañcamīvibhattiatthe anuttakālikā hutvā “tvaṁ mā karosi, mā āharasī”ti majjhimapurisappayogārahā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:463_0: Kiñca bhiyyo “jarādhammaṁ mā jīrīti alabbhaneyyaṁ ṭhāna”ntiādīsupi santepi atītavācakapaṭhamapurisappayogabhāve māsaddayogato ajjatanīvibhattipañcamīvibhattiatthe anuttakālikā hutvā “mā jīratū”tiādinā paṭhamapurisappayogārahā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:463_1: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “jarādhammaṁ mā jīrīti yaṁ mayhaṁ jarāsabhāvaṁ, taṁ mā jīritu.
anya-e0804n2:463_3: Yaṁ panamhehi “akara iti rassapāṭhopī”ti vuttaṁ, tassa “atikara’makarā’cariya, mayhampetaṁ na ruccatī”ti imāya pāḷiyā vasena atthitā veditabbā.
anya-e0804n2:463_4: Tassāyamattho “ācariya bhavaṁ atikkantakaraṇaṁ akarā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:463_5: Apica “bhava”nti vattabbe atthe “tva”nti vacanaṁ vattabbamevāti adhippāyavasena “ācariya tvaṁ atikkantakaraṇaṁ karosī”ti yojanāpi kātabbāva.
anya-e0804n2:464_2: Ettha “saṁvaḍḍhayitvā puḷinaṁ, akaṁ puḷinacetiya”nti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:465_0: Ettha ca pañcavidho sekāro āharitvā dassetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:465_1: Tathā hi pañcavidho sekāro padāvayava apadāvayavaanekantapadāvayava sosaddattha ādesavasena.
anya-e0804n2:465_2: Tattha padāvayavo sekāro “tvaṁ kammaṁ kuruse, tvaṁ atthakusalo abhavase”tiādīsu daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n2:465_7: Ettha hi sekāro yadi pañcamīvibhattiyaṁ āmasevacanassāvayavo, tadā pañcamīvibhattiyuttānaṁ patthanāsīsanatthānaṁ “bhavāmase, gaṇhāmase”ti padānaṁ avayavo hoti.
anya-e0804n2:465_8: Yadi pana āgamo, pañcamīvibhattiyuttānaṁ patthanāsīsanatthānaṁ “bhavāma, gaṇhāmā”ti padānaṁ avayavo na hoti, evaṁ “bhavāmase”tiādīsu sekārassa anekantapadāvayavattaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:465_10: Eseseti imassa hi “esoso eko ekaṭṭho”ti attho.
anya-e0804n2:465_11: Ādeso “akaramhasa te kicca”nti ettha, “okkantāmasi bhūtānī”ti cettha daṭṭhabbo ekārassa akārikārādesakaraṇavasena.
anya-e0804n2:465_12: Tattha “akaramhasa te kicca”nti imassa “akaramhase te kicca”nti attho.
anya-e0804n2:465_13: “Akaramhase”ti cettha sace sekāro āgamo, tadā “karamhā”ti padaṁ hiyyattanīparassapade uttamapurisabahuvacanantaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:465_14: Sace pana mhasevacanassāvayavo, tadā “akaramhase”ti padaṁ hiyyattanīattanopade uttamapurisabahuvacanantaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:466_0: Akari, kari, akāsi, akaruṁ, akariṁsu, akaṁsu, akaṁsuṁ. Akaro, akarittha, akāsittha.
anya-e0804n2:467_0: Ettha ca akaroti tvaṁ akaroti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:467_1: “Akaro” iti hi padaṁ “varañce me ado sakkā”ti ettha majjhimapurisekavacanatthaṁ “ado”ti padamiva daṭṭhabbaṁ pāḷiyaṁ avijjamānattepi nayavasena gahetabbattā.
anya-e0804n2:467_4: Tathā hi “adāsi me, akāsi me”ti paṭhamapurisapāḷiyo bahū sandissanti.
anya-e0804n2:467_5: “Mākāsi mukhasā pāpaṁ, mā kho sūkaramukho ahū”tiādīsu pana māsaddayogato “tvaṁ pāpaṁ mā akāsi, mā sūkaramukho ahosī”ti padayojanā kātabbā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:468_0: Akariṁ, kariṁ, akāsiṁ, akarimha, karimha, akāsimha.
anya-e0804n2:470_0: Akarissā, akarissa, akarissaṁsūti sesaṁ sabbaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Kālātipattivasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:472_0: Kayiratu, kayirantu. Sesaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Pañcamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:474_0: Tattha kayirāti idaṁ “puññañce puriso kayirā”ti dassanato paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṁ, “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti etthāpi “sārathi bhavaṁ adhammaṁ kareyyā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṁ, na majjhimapurisavasena.
anya-e0804n2:474_1: Atha vā “kayirāsī”ti vattabbe sikāralopaṁ katvā “kayirā”ti majjhimapurisavacanaṁ vuttanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:475_1: yathā “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti pāḷiyaṁ “labhethā”ti imassa padassa “sabbhireva samāsetha, sabbhi kubbetha santhava”ntiādīsu “samāsethā”tiādīnaṁ viya paṭhamapurisavasena atthaṁ aggahetvā purisavipallāsaṁ katvā “labheyya”nti uttamapurisavasenattho aṭṭhakathācariyehi gahito, tathā tumhehipi “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha “kayirā”ti padassa purisavipallāsaṁ katvā “kareyyāsī”ti majjhimapurisavasenattho vattabbo, aṭṭhakathācariyehipi “kareyyāsī”ti tadattho vuttoti?
anya-e0804n2:475_2: Saccaṁ, evaṁ santepi aṭṭhakathācariyehi vohāratthesu paramakosallasamannāgatattā “tva”nti vattabbe atthe bhavaṁsaddo pavattati, “bhava”nti vattabbe atthe tvaṁsaddo pavattatīti cintetvā adhippāyatthavasena “kareyyāsī”ti attho vutto, na purisavipallāsavasena.
anya-e0804n2:475_3: Tathā hi “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti imassa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “labhethā”ti ulliṅgitvā “labheyya”nti purisavipallāsavasena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0804n2:475_4: “Adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti imassa pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “kayirā”ti ulliṅgitvā “kareyyāsī”ti vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ, tasmā “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha purisavipallāso na cintetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:475_5: Atha vā yathā “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti ettha ca “kāye rajo na limpethā”tiādīsu ethavacanaṁ gahitaṁ, evaṁ ethavacanaṁ aggahetvā “labhe athā”ti padacchedo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0804n2:475_7: Tattha labheti sattamiyā uttamapurisavacanaṁ “vajjhañcāpi pamocaye”ti padamiva.
anya-e0804n2:475_9: Ettha ca adhikārantaravasena aparampi varaṁ puttaṁ labheyyanti attho.
anya-e0804n2:475_10: Yasmā panettha dvinnamatthānaṁ uppatti dissati, yasmā cetesu dvīsu dujjāno bhagavato adhippāyo, tasmā dvepi atthā gahetabbāva.
anya-e0804n2:476_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi liṅgavipallāso vibhattivipallāso vacanavipallāso kālavipallāso purisavipallāso akkharavipallāsoti chabbidho vipallāso āharitvā dassetabbo, tathāpi so upari āvibhavissatīti na dassito.
anya-e0804n2:476_1: Tatra kayirāthāti padaṁ sattamiyā parassapadavasena attanopadavasena ca dvidhā bhijjati, tathā majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena ca.
anya-e0804n2:476_2: Tathā hi “yathā puññāni kayirātha, dadantā aparāpara”nti ettha “kayirāthā”ti idaṁ sattamiyā parassapadavasena majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena ca vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:476_4: “Kayirātha dhīro puññānī”ti ettha pana “kayirāthā”ti idaṁ sattamiyā attanopadavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena ca vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:476_6: Idha parokkhādivasena yirapaccayasahitāni rūpāni yebhuyyena sāsane appasiddhānīti na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n2:477_1: Karotīti kattā, evaṁ kārako kārakaṁ vā.
anya-e0804n2:477_2: Ettha hi kārakasaddo yattha kattukārakakammakārakādivācako, tattha pulliṅgopi hoti, yebhuyyena napuṁsakaliṅgopi.
anya-e0804n2:477_3: Yattha pana rajatakārakammakāralohakārādivācako, tattha pulliṅgo eva.
anya-e0804n2:477_5: Karaṁ, kubbaṁ, krubbaṁ, karonto, kubbanto, kubbāno, kurumāno, pakruṁbbamāno.
anya-e0804n2:477_10: Saṅkhāro, parikkhāro, parikkhato, purakkhato, karaṇaṁ, kriyā.
anya-e0804n2:477_12: Ettha kriyāsaddo kiñcāpi “aphalā hoti akrubbato”tiādīsu kakārarakārasaṁyogavantāni padāni dissanti, tathāpi klesasaddo viya pāḷiyaṁ na dissati, adissamānopi so aṭṭhakathācariyādīhi garūhi gahitattā gahetabbova.
anya-e0804n2:478_2: Katvā, katvāna, kātuna, karitvā, karitvāna, kacca, adhikacca, kariya, kariyāna, purakkhitvā, kāretvā.
anya-e0804n2:479_2: Akkharacintakā pana saddasatthanayaṁ nissāya “adhikicca” iti rūpaṁ icchanti, mayaṁ panetādisaṁ rūpaṁ pāḷiyā anukūlaṁ na hotīti na icchāma.
anya-e0804n2:479_3: Tathā hi therikāgāthāyaṁ gotamiyā parinibbānavacane “padakkhiṇaṁ kacca nipacca pāde”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n2:479_5: Kaccāti padassa dassanena adhikaccāti padampi diṭṭhameva hoti, esa nayo aññatrāpi yathārahaṁ veditabbo.
anya-e0804n2:480_0: Idāni karotissa dhātussa appamattakaṁ atthātisayayogaṁ kathayāma –
anya-e0804n2:481_0: Tatra taṇhaṅkaroti veneyyānaṁ taṇhaṁ lobhaṁ karoti hiṁsatīti taṇhaṅkaro.
anya-e0804n2:481_1: Atha vā rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā attani sakalalokassa taṇhaṁ sinehaṁ karoti janetīti taṇhaṅkaro.
anya-e0804n2:481_4: Sante na kurute piyanti sappurise attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:481_5: Atha vā piyaṁ piyāyamāno tussamāno modamāno sante na kurute na sevatīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:481_6: Yathā “rājānaṁ sevatī”ti etasmiṁ atthe rājānaṁ piyaṁ kuruteti saddasatthavidū mantenti, dullabhāyaṁ nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n2:482_0: Ettha ca parikkhārasaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate, “parikkhāroti sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhittaṁ hotī”tiādīsu parivāro vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:485_0: Jāgara niddakkhaye. Jāgaroti. Jāgaraṁ. Dīghā jāgarato ratti.
anya-e0804n2:486_0: Tanādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:493_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
